quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
name: Brad Henry

quote: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: My father was my teacher. But most importantly he was a great dad.
name: Beau Bridges

quote: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.
name: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: Of all the hard jobs around, one of the hardest is being a good teacher.
name: Maggie Gallagher

quote: Come forth into the light of things, let nature be your teacher.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
name: Bill Gates

quote: Education is the key to success in life, and teachers make a lasting impact in the lives of their students.
name: Solomon Ortiz

quote: Any good teacher knows how important it is to connect with students and understand our culture.
name: Adora Svitak

quote: A good teacher is a determined person.
name: Gilbert Highet

quote: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: One good teacher in a lifetime may sometimes change a delinquent into a solid citizen.
name: Philip Wylie

quote: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterward.
name: Vernon Law

quote: Good teachers know how to bring out the best in students.
name: Charles Kuralt

quote: A good teacher must be able to put himself in the place of those who find learning hard.
name: Eliphas Levi

quote: I cannot emphasize enough the importance of a good teacher.
name: Temple Grandin

quote: Your best teacher is your last mistake.
name: Ralph Nader

quote: Experience is the teacher of all things.
name: Julius Caesar

quote: I like a teacher who gives you something to take home to think about besides homework.
name: Lily Tomlin

quote: Teachers can change lives with just the right mix of chalk and challenges.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: It's the teacher that makes the difference, not the classroom.
name: Michael Morpurgo

quote: The one exclusive sign of thorough knowledge is the power of teaching.
name: Aristotle

quote: Experience is a good teacher, but she sends in terrific bills.
name: Minna Antrim

quote: In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.
name: Henry Adams

quote: I am indebted to my father for living, but to my teacher for living well.
name: Alexander the Great

quote: I was lucky that I met the right mentors and teachers at the right moment.
name: James Levine

quote: The task of the modern educator is not to cut down jungles, but to irrigate deserts.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: So what does a good teacher do? Create tension - but just the right amount.
name: Donald Norman

quote: A good teacher must know the rules; a good pupil, the exceptions.
name: Martin H. Fischer

quote: There's many a bestseller that could have been prevented by a good teacher.
name: Flannery O'Connor

quote: Fear is not a good teacher. The lessons of fear are quickly forgotten.
name: Mary Catherine Bateson

quote: A mentor, a 'teacher,' is like an editor. I absolutely value my editor, who is my teacher.
name: David Bergen

quote: I touch the future. I teach.
name: Christa McAuliffe

quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
name: Mark Van Doren

quote: A child's learning is a function more of the characteristics of his classmates than those of the teacher.
name: James S. Coleman

quote: A professor must have a theory as a dog must have fleas.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: A true teacher defends his students against his own personal influences.
name: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: Those who know how to think need no teachers.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Love is a better teacher than duty.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: The best thing we can do with rejection is to make it a learning experience - rejection is a great teacher.
name: Adena Friedman

quote: The best teacher is very interactive.
name: Bill Gates

quote: A teacher must believe in the value and interest of his subject as a doctor believes in health.
name: Gilbert Highet

quote: Take away paradox from the thinker and you have a professor.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: I wasn't a very good teacher.
name: Amos Lee

quote: Thus, the standard library will serve as both a tool and as a teacher.
name: Bjarne Stroustrup

quote: If I can make a teacher's salary doing comedy, I think that's better than being a teacher.
name: Dave Chappelle

quote: When I was about ten years old, I gave my teacher an April Fool's sandwich, which had a dead goldfish in it.
name: Alan Alda

quote: Time is a great teacher, but unfortunately it kills all its pupils.
name: Hector Berlioz

quote: What a blind person needs is not a teacher but another self.
name: Helen Keller

quote: History is Philosophy teaching by example.
name: Thucydides

quote: Everybody who is incapable of learning has taken to teaching.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: My dad was such a great story-teller, a good teacher.
name: Grace Poe

quote: A teacher should have a creative mind.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: There is no recipe to be a great teacher, that's what is unique about them.
name: Robert Sternberg

quote: I am a teacher. And I think I am a serious one who happens to be enjoying life.
name: Leo Buscaglia

quote: I'm a teacher still, but with a much larger classroom.
name: Rick Riordan

quote: I love kids, so two things that I have thought about are being a pediatrician or a kindergarten teacher.
name: Karlie Kloss

quote: I had a terrible education. I attended a school for emotionally disturbed teachers.
name: Woody Allen

quote: I was a high-school teacher. I am a strong advocate for women's rights, and I'm not a woman.
name: Justin Trudeau

quote: I've got a friend who is a lion tamer. He used to be a school teacher till he lost his nerve.
name: Les Dawson

quote: Delayed gratification is a sweet lesson whose teacher knows the best is not right now, it is yet to be.
name: Maximillian Degenerez

quote: I have always believed that 98% of a student's progress is due to his own efforts, and 2% to his teacher.
name: John Philip Sousa

quote: Every child grows; everything depends on the teacher.
name: Shinichi Suzuki

quote: Prosperity is a great teacher; adversity a greater.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: I'm embarrassed every time I look a teacher in the eye, because we ask them to do so much for so little.
name: Phil McGraw

quote: I'm an unemployed teacher right now and I'm looking for a place to teach.
name: Bobby Knight

quote: If you become a teacher, by your pupils you'll be taught.
name: Oscar Hammerstein II

quote: Students rarely disappoint teachers who assure them in advance that they are doomed to failure.
name: Sidney Hook

quote: I'm like a really goofy home ec teacher.
name: Alton Brown

quote: My father's a preacher, my mother's a teacher, thus I rhyme.
name: Saul Williams

quote: My mother was the strength. She was the anchor. She was a preacher and a teacher.
name: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf

quote: A child's first teacher is its mother.
name: Peng Liyuan

quote: I'm not a writer who teaches. I'm a teacher who writes.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: I've learned that mistakes can often be as good a teacher as success.
name: Jack Welch

quote: We must use the wrath of nature as our teacher.
name: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quote: He most honors my style who learns under it to destroy the teacher.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: I'm glad I was a teacher.
name: John Wooden

quote: History is the only true teacher, the revolution the best school for the proletariat.
name: Rosa Luxemburg

quote: A professor is someone who talks in someone else's sleep.
name: W. H. Auden

quote: The teacher is the one who gets the most out of the lessons, and the true teacher is the learner.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: No bubble is so iridescent or floats longer than that blown by the successful teacher.
name: William Osler

quote: The world of knowledge takes a crazy turn when teachers themselves are taught to learn.
name: Bertolt Brecht

quote: Fear is not a lasting teacher of duty.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: As a former teacher and a mother and grandmother, I know firsthand the importance of a quality education.
name: Sue Kelly

quote: Events are the best teacher for us. You try to learn from people, there is always some bend to it.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: I wanted to be an English teacher. I wanted to do it for the corduroy jackets with patches on the side.
name: John Krasinski

quote: Everybody's a teacher if you listen.
name: Doris Roberts

quote: I'd like to think I'm a great teacher.
name: Gordon Ramsay

quote: Music when healthy, is the teacher of perfect order, and when depraved, the teacher of perfect disorder.
name: John Ruskin

quote: The object of teaching a child is to enable him to get along without his teacher.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: In Swat, there are two jobs a woman's going to do: a teacher or a doctor. If not, then become a housewife.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: What students lack in school is an intellectual relationship or conversation with the teacher.
name: William Glasser

quote: The word 'guru' is very loaded, so I would never refer to myself that way. I see myself as a teacher.
name: Gabrielle Bernstein

quote: As a student I learned from wonderful teachers and ever since then I've thought everyone is a teacher.
name: Bill Moyers

quote: I wanted to be a teacher.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: Advice is sometimes transmitted more successfully through a joke than grave teaching.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: My brother's my teacher, my mentor, and we both learnt all the acting basics from our father.
name: Jeff Bridges

quote: Why not whip the teacher when the pupil misbehaves?
name: Diogenes

quote: My ambition in high school was to be a high school coach and teacher, and that's still what I do: teach.
name: Mike Krzyzewski

quote: If you're a coach, you're a teacher.
name: Nick Saban

quote: A teacher who is not dogmatic is simply a teacher who is not teaching.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: I'm a teacher. My mother was a teacher. I spent 40 years as a teacher.
name: Bobby Knight

quote: Jesus Christ is infinitely more than a great teacher and philosopher.
name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: Do I think it's OK to fight authority as long as you're only talking about the high school teacher? No.
name: John Mellencamp

quote: I claim Dickens as a mentor. He's my teacher. He's one of my driving forces.
name: Anne Rice

quote: The impending teacher shortage is the most critical education issue we will face in the next decade.
name: David Price

quote: The best came from my martial arts teacher, who also taught Elvis. He said, 'Your ego will get you killed.'
name: William Sanderson

quote: My father was a swim teacher. We used to swim before school, swim after school.
name: Gordon Ramsay

quote: They should regard me as what I am. I am a spiritual leader and teacher.
name: Louis Farrakhan

quote: A self-taught man usually has a poor teacher and a worse student.
name: Henny Youngman

quote: A teacher should have maximal authority, and minimal power.
name: Thomas Szasz

quote: I'm not a prophet. I'm not a teacher. I have no degrees. My degree is from the University of Life.
name: Jamie Lee Curtis

quote: Castro has been a teacher for me. A master. Not on ideology but on strategy.
name: Hugo Chavez

quote: Every marriage tends to consist of an aristocrat and a peasant. Of a teacher and a learner.
name: John Updike

quote: Nearly everyone I met, worked with, or read about was my teacher, one way or another.
name: Loretta Young

quote: The best CEOs I know are teachers, and at the core of what they teach is strategy.
name: Michael Porter

quote: It was God who made me so beautiful. If I weren't, then I'd be a teacher.
name: Linda Evangelista

quote: Experience is a great teacher.
name: John Legend

quote: When I was 11, I played the part of Rumpelstiltskin, and my teacher told me I would make a great actor.
name: Brian Blessed

quote: I don't learn so good, no matter how good the teacher is.
name: Warren Zevon

quote: I never thought, 'Oh God, I'm in Prince's shadow.' He'd been performing for years, and he was my teacher.
name: Vanity

quote: Tiger's a horrible golf teacher.
name: Stuart Scott

quote: I'm trained as a teacher; that's the only thing I've got a certificate for.
name: Quentin Blake

quote: Parents can shape a child, but a great teacher can, too.
name: Susanne Bier

quote: I would rather trust my child to a serpent than to a teacher who does not believe in God.
name: Karl G. Maeser

quote: A teacher enlarges people in all sorts of ways besides just his subject matter.
name: Wallace Stegner

quote: Being a mother has been my greatest teacher and also the most self-sacrificing thing I've ever done.
name: Katey Sagal

quote: You know how to tell if the teacher is hung over? Movie Day.
name: Jay Mohr

quote: I was born to be a teacher, and I'll die a teacher.
name: Jacques Parizeau

quote: My mother was born in Baltimore, and before her marriage, she was an artist and teacher of art.
name: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quote: Let's reintroduce corporal punishment in the schools - and use it on the teachers.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: The greatest teacher I know is the job itself.
name: James Cash Penney

quote: It is the malady of our age that the young are so busy teaching us that they have no time left to learn.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: The most important part of teaching is to teach what it is to know.
name: Simone Weil

quote: I could undertake to be an efficient pupil if it were possible to find an efficient teacher.
name: Gertrude Stein

quote: I'm sure that had I not been a coach, I would have been some form of a teacher.
name: John Madden

quote: This is what I would have done if I had to have a real job: I would have been a history teacher.
name: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: I want to thank my mum, my daddy, my coach, my teacher, everybody in my life.
name: Jet Li

quote: I was always shouted at by my teacher because I would draw straight on the table in the school.
name: Christian Louboutin

quote: My father was a teacher and my mother also worked in the school, so the family has a background in education.
name: Nick Cave

quote: Jesse Jackson is a leader and a teacher who can open our hearts and open our minds and stir our very souls.
name: Ann Richards

quote: My daughter became a teacher right out of college.
name: Al Franken

quote: If I'd stayed at college I would have become a teacher.
name: Syd Barrett

quote: My father worked in a tyre factory. My mother worked as a teacher.
name: Paul Polman

quote: My mother was a high school arts teacher, so I was always surrounded by the arts.
name: John Lasseter

quote: Growing up in Kansas City, I was always neat, the teacher's pet, know-it-all type.
name: Gretchen Rubin

quote: Only one person in a million becomes enlightened without a teacher's help.
name: Bodhidharma

quote: I'm really not a celebrity; I'm just a teacher.
name: Chuck Noll

quote: I hope to become a better teacher. I love teaching.
name: Chelsea Clinton

quote: The best teacher is an entertainer.
name: Bob Keeshan

quote: Last time I was in Jamaica I financed a teacher to teach in an orphanage.
name: Ziggy Marley

quote: For the longest time, you just sound like a broken record, but you have to be consistent when teaching kids.
name: Heidi Klum

quote: I had a ninth grade teacher who told me I was much smarter and much better than I was allowing myself to be.
name: Scott Hamilton

quote: Coach Dyer was a great mentor for me and a great teacher.
name: Scottie Pippen

quote: I planned on being an English teacher, but I don't know where that went.
name: John Krasinski

quote: I have had a singing teacher in L.A. for many, many years just to work on my voice as an actor.
name: Pierce Brosnan

quote: Many of us have been touched by the magic of a great teacher. I know I have.
name: Bruce Rauner

quote: We should not run away from religious teachings. We should run to them.
name: James Carville

quote: A self-defined challenge is an irresistible teacher.
name: Marilyn Ferguson

quote: For a little while, my mom was a school teacher. And I went to the school that she taught.
name: Aisha Tyler

quote: I actually never got in a play in school. My teacher said I never learned my lines.
name: Sissy Spacek

quote: I will venture to maintain that where the teacher is not pleasing to the pupil, there is no education.
name: Xenophon

quote: If you don't have a teacher you can't have a disciple.
name: Dallas Willard

quote: I do readings at the public library. I just did a benefit scene night for my old acting teacher.
name: Mark Ruffalo

quote: As a kid, I had this ultimate goal to be a teacher. I wanted to be a history teacher like my dad.
name: Mike Trout

quote: I was an elementary school teacher.
name: Luciano Pavarotti

quote: I was a teacher once.
name: Nita Ambani

quote: Vadim was both my teacher and my husband. I placed myself entirely in his hands.
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: The main thing I am interested in is my experience as a teacher.
name: Frank McCourt

quote: If I have a cause, it's the cause of the teacher.
name: Frank McCourt

quote: I worked as a secretary, a waitress and a dance teacher - all in high school.
name: Jennie Garth

quote: As a child, I had a teacher who told me, 'Look, Anne, one person can't make a difference.'
name: Anne Wojcicki

quote: I had a great movement teacher - he showed me how to walk so I wasn't becoming like a cartoon.
name: John Leguizamo

quote: I've never had the patience of a teacher.
name: Josh Turner

quote: I had a great drama teacher in high school, and that's when I started to learn about the history of theater.
name: Elizabeth Olsen

quote: My sister is an ER doctor, and my brother is a teacher.
name: Rami Malek

quote: I want to work with kids. I would love to be a teacher.
name: Amy Lee

quote: I have an education degree from the University of Minnesota, and I was a teacher for about a minute.
name: Loni Anderson

quote: I call myself a meditation teacher rather than a spiritual teacher.
name: Sharon Salzberg

quote: About me - I used to want to be a P.E. teacher, and kind of still do.
name: Miranda Hart

quote: Believe it or not, one teacher used to call me a giant spastic for not being able to play football.
name: Peter Capaldi

quote: The office of the public teacher is an unenviable and thankless one.
name: Felix Adler

quote: I had been a college teacher. I had taught Greek mythology.
name: Wes Craven

quote: I'm a school teacher, and later on, well past my formal education, I became very interested in science.
name: Bernard Beckett

quote: I was always getting told off by my choir teacher for, you know, riffing when I shouldn't.
name: Rita Ora

quote: I think teaching should be an exalted profession, not a picked-on profession.
name: Chuck Schumer

quote: If you have to put someone on a pedestal, put teachers. They are society's heroes.
name: Guy Kawasaki

quote: We expert teachers know that motivation and emotional impact are what matter.
name: Donald Norman

quote: It was my family that wanted me to be a teacher. That was safe, you see. To be a painter was terrible.
name: Josef Albers

quote: My mother was a teacher.
name: Hugh Grant

quote: I'm home schooled, and I have a teacher that goes with me on all my movies.
name: Dakota Fanning

quote: Tragedy is a hell of a teacher. It's much too strict, but it's a hell of a teacher.
name: Harlan Coben

quote: I wanted to be a ballet teacher.
name: Jaclyn Smith

quote: If I can only be known as one thing, then, well, I guess it would be poet and performer and teacher.
name: Juan Felipe Herrera

quote: Smartness runs in my family. When I went to school I was so smart my teacher was in my class for five years.
name: Gracie Allen

quote: My art teacher in junior high was a very out gay man and a mentor to me.
name: Gus Van Sant

quote: Ultimately, it is only the witness who convinces people, not the teacher.
name: Blase J. Cupich

quote: A teacher is a person who never says anything once.
name: Howard Nemerov

quote: I hope that I serve by being a teacher.
name: Jenna Bush

quote: I could never let the teacher down. I always worked hard, too scared to get in trouble.
name: Zoe Sugg

quote: But the idea that I should be a teacher and a researcher of some sort did not vary over the years.
name: Amartya Sen

quote: School district policies and practices have not kept pace with student and teacher needs.
name: Eli Broad

quote: My teacher wanted me to do 'Hot Cross Buns,' but all I wanted to learn was 'Island in the Sun' by Weezer.
name: Clairo

quote: Americanism demands loyalty to the teacher and respect for his lesson.
name: Bainbridge Colby

quote: My father still is a lawyer, and my mom was a teacher and then later a career counselor.
name: Steve Case

quote: I thought I'd grow up to be a teacher, or maybe run for political office.
name: Jake Shimabukuro

quote: I could never have a better teacher in those days than my father.
name: Tony Visconti

quote: Personal trainers, however nice, give me PE teacher flashbacks.
name: Naomi Alderman

quote: I'm not a teacher; I'm not a historian. I'm trying to create a world for my characters.
name: Colson Whitehead

quote: Experience can be a great teacher.
name: Burgess Owens

quote: You know, I loved math. My mom was a math teacher.
name: Joan Cusack

quote: You never stop learning. If you have a teacher, you never stop being a student.
name: Elisabeth Rohm

quote: Liz Benedict, a teacher of mine at Iowa, is the person who introduced me to James Salter's work.
name: Alexander Chee

quote: I learned early on that 'rabbi' means teacher, not priest.
name: George Steiner

quote: If I weren't an actor, I'd either be a teacher or a critic.
name: Dennis Haysbert

quote: When I was a student at Mizzou, I was a daycare teacher. I did it because was a latchkey kid.
name: Jon Hamm

quote: Ensuring all kids have access to an effective, talented teacher needs to be a national priority.
name: Michael Bennet

quote: No matter how much you like your local school teacher, he or she is a government agent.
name: Nancy Pearcey

quote: David Levi is a teacher as well as a chef, and, like most teachers, he loves to talk.
name: Kate Christensen

quote: I've never considered myself a celebrity or even part of the entertainment business. I'm a cooking teacher.
name: Martin Yan

quote: I was born in a small town. My parents, my father was a teacher. My mother was a housewife.
name: Milos Forman

quote: To this end the greatest asset of a school is the personality of the teacher.
name: John Strachan

quote: Had acting not taken off, I would've been glad to become a teacher.
name: Nithya Menen

quote: I draw inspiration from everything I've seen and been through. My life has been my biggest teacher.
name: Nithya Menen

quote: When I was 16, I was taught by a wonderful teacher who let me ignore the Greek syllabus and just read Homer.
name: Alice Oswald

quote: I owe my whole career as a storyteller to my father. He was an actor/director/producer and teacher.
name: John Lithgow

quote: My old dance teacher, Jimmy Wilde, a former European ballroom dancing champion, was so sophisticated.
name: Anton du Beke

quote: I never intended to be a teacher. I just like going to school and learning things.
name: Guy Davenport

quote: My first public impression was my French teacher, Derek Swift.
name: Rory Bremner

quote: It's every teacher's job to be rigorous about constantly being open to new ideas and innovation.
name: Brandon Webb

quote: I got an old school coach who's more of a teacher than a coach.
name: Andre Ward

quote: My father followed, during most of his life, the precarious occupation of a country school teacher.
name: Simon Newcomb

quote: I spent ridiculous amounts of time as an activist and volunteer and was a teacher for 20 years.
name: Johann Lamont

quote: When I was really young, I wanted to be a history teacher because I was obsessed with the past.
name: Russell Tovey

quote: Mike Watt and I had the same teacher. Mr. Tanaka.
name: Krist Novoselic

quote: In business, experience is the big teacher.
name: Matthew Stewart

quote: I'm lucky I had some teachers who saw something in me.
name: Ann Bancroft

quote: I spent most of my high school years on movie sets and I'd have like one teacher, which was really bad.
name: Devon Sawa

quote: I was a hyper kid in school and the teacher suggested to my mom she needed to do something with me.
name: Devon Sawa

quote: My father was a schoolteacher and my mother came from a teacher's family.
name: Simon van der Meer

quote: TV is bigger than any story it reports. It's the greatest teaching tool since the printing press.
name: Fred W. Friendly
